    • Method Detail

      • builderFromBody

        public static Body.Builder builderFromBody(Body b)
        Static factory method that creates a new builder object from an existing body. This is useful if you want to make a new body that is only slightly different than an existing body. If you call build() on the return value of this method without modifying it you will receive a an exact duplicate of the body in the parameter b.
        Parameters:
        b - The body to create the builder from.
        Returns:
        The resulting Body.Builder object.

      • changeShape

        public Body.Builder changeShape(Shape shape)
        Parameters:
        shape - New shape of the body
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • changeMass

        public Body.Builder changeMass(double mass)
        Changes the mass of the body. If the body's position was fixed it will not be once you give if a finite mass.
        Parameters:
        mass - New mass of the body
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • changePos

        public Body.Builder changePos(Vector3 pos)
        Parameters:
        pos - New position of the body
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • fixBody

        public Body.Builder fixBody()
        Sets the position and rotation (on all axes) of the body as fixed
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • fixPos

        public Body.Builder fixPos()
        Sets the position of the body as fixed
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • fixRot

        public Body.Builder fixRot()
        Sets the rotation of the body as fixed on all axes.
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • fixAxes

        public Body.Builder fixAxes(Set<PhysicsBody.Axis> axes)
        Sets the rotation of the body to fixed on a specified set of axes.
        Parameters:
        axes - The set of axes
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object.

      • setConstraint

        public Body.Builder setConstraint(Manifold constraint)

      • fixRotationAround

        public Body.Builder fixRotationAround(Vector3 axisBody,
                                      double scalerInertia)
        Fixes the rotation around a specific axis (body coordinates). This will override all other changes to rotational properties including fixRot(), fixPos(), inertiaTensor(Matrix3), and fixAxes(Set).
        Parameters:
        axisBody - rotation is limited to around this axis (body coordinates)
        scalerInertia - scaler inertia around the axis
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • initialRotation

        public Body.Builder initialRotation(Quaternion q0)
        Parameters:
        q0 - Sets the initial orientation of the body in space.
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • initialVelocity

        public Body.Builder initialVelocity(Vector3 v)
        Parameters:
        v - Sets the initial velocity of the body
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • initialOmega

        public Body.Builder initialOmega(Vector3 omega)
        Parameters:
        omega - Sets the initial angular velocity of the body in body coordinates
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • inertiaTensor

        public Body.Builder inertiaTensor(Matrix3 inertia)
        Changes the inertia tensor of the body. If the body's rotation was fixed it will no longer be once the inertia tensor is set to a finite value.
        Parameters:
        inertia - Sets the moment of inertia of the body in the body frame coordinates.
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • material

        public Body.Builder material(Material mat)
        Parameters:
        mat - Gives the body a new material
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • boundVolume

        public Body.Builder boundVolume(BoundVolume boundingVolume)
        Parameters:
        boundingVolume - Gives the body a custom bounding volume
        Returns:
        The updated Body.Builder object

      • build

        public Body build()
        Creates the Body object
        Returns:
        The Body object created from this builder.
